comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content: Do you think that Moore might be have been positioned in front of the lighthouse when he took this shot?
comment.authorname: National Library NZ on The Commons

comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content:
It is definitely from a lower angle, so it's quite likely he was at the level of the bottom of the lighthouse.

I'll have a look sometime through my castlepoint shots and see if I can find a similar angle.  All else fails, I'll just have to try to duplicate it next time I'm out there. LOL. :)

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content: If you're keen to do re-enactments, we have some marvellous wrestling photos in the collections we're keen to do something with this year .....!
comment.authorname: National Library NZ on The Commons

comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content: Now the thought of that has me laughing out loud!

comment.author: 8581745@N08
comment._content: That's an interesting picture. I haven't been to Castlepoint since 2001 (still in the U.K.) but took a photo then that looks almost exactly the same (except it's in colour). Suprising how little the place had changed - although it could well be different now!
